peregrine.io.partition
Class DefaultPartitionWriter

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.io.partition.DefaultPartitionWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, ChunkWriter, PartitionWriter, SequenceWriter
public class DefaultPartitionWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PartitionWriter, ChunkWriter

Write a partition as a given stream of key/value pairs and rollover chunks as they are filled.
